subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Rain
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Unlike Wimbledon and the Australian Open, the U. S. Open lacks a rainproof solution for delays and for the second consecutive year, it will be forced to finish on a Monday.
snippet: Unlike Wimbledon and the Australian Open, the U. S. Open lacks a rainproof solution for delays and for the second consecutive year, it will be forced to finish on a Monday.
